thag1.1:1.0.2: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
thag1.1:1.1: Like the lions of mighty fang
thag1.1:1.3: hear now from those who’ve practiced well
thag1.1:2.1: What their name, and what their clan,
thag1.1:2.2: and how they lived by the teaching;
thag1.1:2.3: how dedicated were those wise ones,
thag1.1:3.4: they spoke about it in these words.
thag1.1:4.1: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, <j>sheltered from the wind:
thag1.1:4.2: so rain, sky-god, as you please!
thag1.1:4.3: My mind is serene and freed,
thag1.1:4.4: I practice wholeheartedly: so rain, sky-god!
thag1.1:4.5: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Subhūti.
